18601.description:
Ick... what a disgusting creature!  It is black and green and slimy
and it is drooling everywhere... looks mean too.
18601.long_desc: The big, ugly pit-beast is standing here sizing you up.
18601.name: pitbeast

18602.description:
What an odd looking little beast.  He looks harmless, but you never can
tell.  He is only about 4 feet tall, but he pretty muscular looking...
maybe you should ask if he needs help?  Nah... kill him.
18602.long_desc: The newbie monster stands here looking confused.  Kill him!  Kill him!
18602.name: newbie

18603.description:
Awwww... how cute!  A little baby dragon.  He's about 3 feet long and you
just want to cuddle him to death... no, you really want to kill him to tell
the truth.  But, remember, even a little dragon can be a big problem.
18603.long_desc: Someone's little pet dragon has gotten loose, and is sniffing about here.
18603.name: dragon

18604.description:
The Guard also had the job of taking care of the Alchemist's pet dragon,
but he doesn't seem to be doing a good job of it.  He looks at you and
says, 'Have you seen that dragon?  Master will have my head if I don't find
him.'
18604.long_desc: The Newbie Guard is here wondering where that dragon went.
18604.name: keeper

18605.description:
He is a funny looking, furry little dude.  He looks really busy trying to
mix up a batch of something or other.
18605.long_desc: The Newbie Alchemist is here trying to make something.
18605.name: alchemist

18606.description:
Yuck!  If they'd ever clean this place maybe it wouldn't attract vermin
like this disgusting, little, six-legged, brown bug.
18606.long_desc: A creepy little crawling thing is scuttling along the floor at your feet.
18606.name: crawler

18607.description:
This guy has been lost in here too long... it is more zombie than man
now.  You would feel sorry for it, but it is moving in to attack!
18607.long_desc: A VERY gaunt looking newbie... it looks like a zombie!
18607.name: newbie

18608.description:
Little green, vaguely humoniod shaped creature, with a long pointed tail.
It is hard to say because before you ever get a good look at it, it darts
back into the shadows.
18608.long_desc: A funny little imp-like thing (a quasit perhaps?) is sneaking about here.
18608.name: quasit

18609.description:
A massive man, with the head of a bull.  He looks as strong as bull too,
but not nearly as smart.  Actually, now that you consider it... he looks
a heck of a lot meaner than any bull you have ever seen... and he is
coming this way!
18609.long_desc: The Great Minotaur is wondering just what you'll taste like.
18609.name: minotaur

18610.description:
The soul of a long since passed on adventurer... it lurks here waiting for
a chance to bring death to any who cross its path.
18610.long_desc: The dark spectre is lurking in the shadows.
18610.name: spectre

18611.description:
What a jerk!  He won't shut up, and he keeps making the most irritating
comments about everything.  Better silence him with cold, tempered steel
MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
18611.long_desc: A newbie is here annoying the hell out of you.
18611.name: newbie

18612.description:
What a moron!  Every question that is answered in the help files, he will
ask and he will probably ask 2 or 3 times too.  This guy just doesn't get
it, best put him out of his misery.
18612.long_desc: A newbie is here looking terribly confused.
18612.name: newbie

18613.description:
Well, at least this gal seems pretty cool.  Talks a lot, but she's a
friendly, interesting sort.  Seems to have a clue what she's doing also,
unlike some others you might see.
18613.long_desc: A newbie is here talking a lot.
18613.name: newbie

18614.description:
Hmmm... looks like he has been around a while, but he wandered a little
too far from home this time.  Don't think he knows quite where he is,
maybe you should help him out?
18614.long_desc: A newbie is here wandering about aimlessly.
18614.name: newbie

18615.description:
Here is a guy who has it all together.  Nice equipment too, must have read
the help files, Eh?
18615.long_desc: A newbie is here, and he looks quite sure of himself.
18615.name: newbie

18601.name: sword
18601.room_desc: A shiny newbie sword is lying here waiting to be possessed.

18602.name: vest
18602.room_desc: A bright green newbie vest is lying here looking for a body to hug.

18603.name: helm
18603.room_desc: A bright newbie helm is hoping a loose head will wander by.

18604.name: cloak
18604.room_desc: A dark newbie cloak is lying here hoping to smother you.

18605.name: ring
18605.room_desc: A newbie signet ring is lying in the dust here.

18606.name: dagger
18606.room_desc: A shiny newbie dagger is lying here looking for a back to stab.

18607.name: collar
18607.room_desc: Someone's pet dragon has escaped and left his collar here.

18608.name: key
18608.room_desc: A key with the newbie crest on it is here.

18609.name: light
18609.room_desc: A jar of glowing fluid wants to brighten your day.

18610.name: horns
18610.room_desc: The horns of the great Minotaur lie here.

18611.name: hide
18611.room_desc: The hide of the great Minotaur is lying here.
18611.short_desc: the smelly hide of the Minotaur

18612.name: leggings
18612.room_desc: A pair of neat looking leggings are here.

18613.name: sleeves
18613.room_desc: A set of nifty sleeves is here.

18614.name: mace
18614.room_desc: A finely crafted newbie mace is waiting for a worthy owner.

18615.name: training bastard sword
18615.room_desc: A training bastard sword lies here.
18615.description: A simple training blade for new warriors.

18616.name: worn iron guardplate
18616.room_desc: A worn iron guardplate lies here.

18617.name: initiate's kite shield
18617.room_desc: An initiate's kite shield rests here.

18600.description:
Ahhh... the entrance to the newbie zone! Just the place you have been
looking for. Well, when you've readied yourself you can enter to the
north. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You see the start of the newbie zone.

west.description: Back to the road that way... chickening out already?

18600.name: The Entrance To The Newbie Zone

18601.description:
The passage opens entering a long corridor. You can hear the sound of
creatures roaming about, but you can't tell where the sound emanates
from exactly. Exits lead to the east along the hallway, and south back
to the entrance. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch.

east.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

south.description: The entrance to the newbie zone... how dull

18601.name: The Beginning Of The Passage

18602.description:
You continue wandering down the hallway. Nothing much different here,
but you are positive you here noises behind the door to the south, and
coming from the east. The walls are a bit slimy and moldy here... yeech,
couldn't they hire someone to clean this place? What will the newbies
think? Oh well, you can continue along the hallway to the east or west.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

south.description: A small room lies to the south... you hear something moving about inside.

west.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

18602.name: The Dirty Hallway

18603.description:
Well... you've reached an intersection of two passages, to the north and
east, the passage brightens, while the darker hallway continues to the
south. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in
the corners.

east.description: A brighter hallway leads off that way.

north.description: A brighter hallway leads off that way.

south.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

west.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

18603.name: A Nexus

18604.description:
The thin passage is plain and undecorated, but still clean. It ends
abruptly to the south at a small oak door, behind which you here
movement... The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

north.description: A large domed room.

south.description: A small cluttered room.

18604.name: A Narrow Passage

18605.description:
Ick... a dark damp dirty pit. Even worse, what is that dark damp dirty
thing looking at you from the corner? Ewww... maybe you should go back
up where it is a bit safer, unless you think you can tackle that thing
in the corner. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

up.description: You see a ladder leading up

18605.name: The Dark Pit

18606.description:
Hmmm... this is an interesting little room. Ack, and there is an
interesting little creature staring at you too. He looks a bit surprised
at your intrusion. You can leave via the doors north or east, or you can
stay and annoy him a bit more. There also appears to be some type of
well down here also, but it has a rather secure grate covering it. The
ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

down.description: A ladder leads down into darkness.

east.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

north.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

18606.name: A Small Room

18607.description:
Oh joy! More of this annoying passage. Perhaps there is something more
exciting through that door to the west? Or you can keep searching the
hallways to the north or south. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

north.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

south.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Small Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18607.name: More Of The Hallway

18608.description:
Finally, you are in an open field... it is so nice to breathe fresh air
again! You can return to that dank, smelly place to the east, or take
the exit to the north which appears to lead into a large field. The air
is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: The end of that darn hallway lies back to the east.

north.description: There appears to be a field road to the north.

18608.name: An Open Field By The Great Field

18609.description:
Ahhh... at last, the end of the hallway... you can exit into open air to
the west,or return to the east and make sure you didn't miss anything.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

east.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

west.description: An open field near The Great Field of Midgaard can be seen.

18609.name: The End Of The Passage

18610.description:
The hallway continues on in a east-west direction... and it seems to be
brightening up to the west. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. The air is still and musty.

east.description: A corner in the passage lies to the east.

west.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

18610.name: A Brighter Hallway

18611.description:
Another corner of the passage, and just as untidy as the rest of this
place (maybe more so?). There is a door to the east though... wonder
where that leads? Oh, and the hallway continues west and north. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: You peer into a cluttered little room to the east.

north.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

west.description: More of the hallway there... how exciting!

18611.name: Another Corner

18612.description:
Lots of bottles and flasks lie about this room, but it all looks like
worthless clutter. It appears whatever alchemist has been working here
is really very adept at his art. There are a lot of formulae and spells
written on the walls too... couldn't he buy some paper? There is a door
to the north, and also a dark stairway in the corner leading down, with
a large sign next to it that you probably should read... The air is
still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A nice shiny hallway!

west.description: A corner in the passage lies to the west.

18612.name: The Alchemist's Room

18620.description:
This corner is much like all the others... except you see a strange glow
coming from the south. Could be an exit... you hope. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The passage continues east quite a ways.

south.description: You see an odd red glow from that direction.

18620.name: A Turn In The Passage

18621.description:
This is an intersection of a long east-west passage with a corridor
leading south. The air seems a bit clearer here though, as if you were
approaching an exit. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Turn In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18621.name: A T-Intersection In The Passage

18622.description:
The passage turns from north to west here. The walls are still covered
with the same disgusting green fungus you have seen all along, and you
hear sounds of creatures moving all around... Shadows gather in the
corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Corner Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A T-Intersection In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18622.name: Another Corner

18623.description:
You can hear creatures moving all around... and it is not a
comforting sound at all. The furnishing is nothing to speak of either,
plain grey brick walls with green fungus (or something) growing on them.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward Another Turn. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Crossing Of Corridors. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18623.name: A Corner In The Hallway

18624.description:
Hmmm... the passage turns south here. You beginning to realize you can
easily lose your bearings if you aren't careful, and you don't think you
would like spending too much time here... The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Branching Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Corner In The Hallway. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18624.name: Another Turn

18625.description:
The passage opens into a large oval room. There really isn't much of
interest here though. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
The air is still and musty.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward A Long East-West Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18625.name: A Large Room

18626.description:
This is a long, narrow passage leading east and west. The walls are damp
and covered with mildew and fungus. There is a very unhealthy air about
this place and you're beginning to want out of here... soon. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward A Crossing Of Corridors. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Large Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18626.name: A Long East-West Passage

18627.description:
Here a narrow east-west passage crosses with a wider passage to the
north and south. The air is dank, and has an odor of decay and debris.
Not a nice place at all really... The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward A Corner Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Corner In The Hallway. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward The Entrance. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Long East-West Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18627.name: A Crossing Of Corridors

18628.description:
This room is hardly more than a crossing of passages. You do sense a
slight breeze wafting down the passage to the north though, but it
smells altogether bad... The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Crossing Of Corridors. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18628.name: A Corner Room

18629.description:
It takes you a moment to realize that the red glow here is coming from a
round portal on the floor. It looks almost as if someone had painted a
picture of a dirt running through a field on the floor of this room.
Oddly enough, it is so realistic you can feel the wind in the field
coming out of the picture. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

down.description: Below you, a red-lit portal opens toward The Great Field Of Midgaard. Heat shimmers up from its rim and the air smells faintly of ozone.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward A Branching Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Turn In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18629.name: The Red Room

18630.description:
The north-south passage branches to the east here. There is a queer red
glow coming from that way as well, along with a faint breeze. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward Another Turn. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward An Intersection Of Passages. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: A very odd red glow emanates from that direction.

18630.name: A Branching Passage

18631.description:
Ick... this place is just disgusting. You try and stay clear of the
walls, but the passage is so narrow you keep bumping them anyway. You
are almost convinced that the fungus coating the walls is grabbing at
you too. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward The Entrance. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Large Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Large Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18631.name: A Passage

18632.description:
It is dark, dank, disgusting and cold up here. Plus you here the sounds
of creatures all around... and somehow they don't sound friendly. It
is probably wise to exercise some degree of caution here... no telling
what you may run into here. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Crossing Of Corridors. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Turn In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

up.description: Above you, the corridor leads toward The Alchemist's Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18632.name: The Entrance

18633.description:
Well... what is there to say. More fungus, more weird sounds, and a
slight breeze from the north. Bet you want to sign a lease, don't ya...
The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward An Intersection Of Passages. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A T-Intersection In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18633.name: Another Corner

18634.description:
Cold, smelly, and coated with green fungus... just like last week's
left-overs. Furthermore you want nothing to do with either, you just
want out right now. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Branching Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward Yet Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18634.name: An Intersection Of Passages

18635.description:
This place is just plain nauseating... it certainly smells as if
something (or someone) died in here. You hope you aren't next, but from
the sounds you hear all around, it seems as if something has other
ideas about that. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward A Branch To The South. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward The Entrance. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18635.name: A Turn In The Passage

18636.description:
The east-west passage branches of to the south here. All around is
the odour of death. Actually, the mold and fungus on the walls is doing
great, but otherwise... well... you don't want to think about what else
lives here. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

east.description: To the east, the corridor leads toward Yet Another Corner. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

south.description: To the south, the corridor leads toward A Large Room. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Turn In The Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18636.name: A Branch To The South

18637.description:
The passage turns here and heads north. You sense something up ahead
that way, but you aren't sure what. You aren't sure if you want to know
what either at this point. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward An Intersection Of Passages. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: To the west, the corridor leads toward A Branch To The South. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18637.name: Yet Another Corner

18638.description:
You almost stumble as you enter this room... the sudden feeling of no
walls on either side of you makes you a bit nervous. Suddenly you are
vulnerable on all sides. You can't even tell how big a room this is,
because it extends to the east farther than you light will reach... Dust
motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The room extends into shadows...

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Passage. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

18638.name: A Large Room

18639.description:
As you enter, you light glints of the wall to the east. There appears to
be words scrawled on the wall, and a crude picture. To the west the room
extends beyond the reach of your light, and the dark shadows make you
paranoid... anything could be hiding there. The area is painfully aware
of how exposed you are without walls around. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: To the north, the corridor leads toward A Branch To The South. Damp stones glisten with mildew and a chill draft slides past you.

west.description: The room extends as far as (and farther than) you can see...

18639.name: A Large Room

18640.description:
Here, the passage enters a small room. Exits lead to the east and south,
and you notice a wonderful, large (and tastefully done) statue to the
north. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: A long hallway, ending in a set of steps.

south.description: The hall extends to the south where it seems to lighten somewhat.

18640.name: The Statue's Room

18641.description:
As you continue wandering down the hallway, you notice banners,
pictures, and other fine decorations adorning the walls all along this
passage. It seems very different from the dismal passage where you
entered. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

east.description: The hallway ends at a grand marble staircase.

west.description: The passage leads into a small room.

18641.name: The Hallway

18642.description:
Here, the hall opens into a wide room, with a high domed roof. Now that
that you have come clear of the enclosed passage, Visible is that the
stair leads upward to an open air balcony overlooking the area. To the
south the room continues, and another stair is visible matching the one
ahead. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

south.description: You see another staircase and two passages leading west and south.

west.description: An entrance to a bright passage.

18642.name: The North Stairs

18643.description:
Here you can look out and observe the world around. Constructed in a
semi-circle around the dome of the room, the balcony allows you to look
out in almost any direction. Wandering to the north end, Visible is that
the Great Fields north of Midgaard continue off towards the Dragonhelm
Mountains to the north. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still
and musty.

down.description: Down the stairs to a large, domed room.

south.description: The south end of the balcony.

18643.name: The Balcony

18644.description:
Wow! What a change from the dismal passage to the south. Whoever keeps
this room up must really like newbies. The walls and floor are clean,
and tastefully decorated. You also notice an interesting design on the
floor. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A small room with a statue in it.

south.description: A intersection of passages.

18644.name: A Bright Hallway

18645.description:
Here you can look out and observe the world around. Constructed in a
semi-circle around the dome of the room, the balcony allows you to look
out in almost any direction. Wandering to the south end, Visible is the
great city of Midgaard off to the south-west. Shadows gather in the
corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: The north end of the balcony.

18645.name: The Balcony

18646.description:
Wow! What a change from the dismal passage to the west. Whoever keeps
this room up must really like newbies. The walls and floor are clean,
and tastefully decorated. You also notice an interesting design on the
floor. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs
low overhead.

east.description: The passage opens into a domed room with a grand marble staircase.

west.description: A dark intersection of passages.

18646.name: A Bright Hallway

18647.description:
Here, the hall opens into a wide room, with a high domed roof. Now that
that you have come clear of the enclosed passage, Visible is that the
stair leads upward to an open air balcony overlooking the area. to the
north the room continues, and another stair is visible matching the one
ahead. The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch.

north.description: Another stairway is to the north, as well as a passage to the west.

south.description: A narrow passage to the south, ending in a wood door.

west.description: Back down the bright hallway.

18647.name: The South Stairs
